description: A configuration for the pendant tool. This is how you can configure the tool to your liking.

client.description: The files to include for the client context.

server.description: The files to include for the client context.

shared.description: The files to include for the shared context.

testing.description: The files to include for the testing context. Not required.

knownProblematicFiles.description: Files that are known to be problems. These will be ignored.

outputFileName.description: The name of the file to output the analysis results to. Defaults to `problematic`.

projectFile.description: The project file to use for the pendant tool. Defaults to `default.project.json`.
